# [Overview](..%2F..%2F..%2Fdocs%2Foverview%2FOverview.md) / sky init

# init all

`sky init`

# sky.config.json

`sky init sky-config`

```json
{
    "title": "",
    "apps": [
        {
            "name": "app name",
            "path": ".",
            "target": "web"
        }
    ],
    "modules": [
        {
            "name": "module name",
            "path": "module path"
        }
    ],
    "libs": [
        {
            "path": "lib path"
        }
    ],
    "scripts": {
        "some": "some command"
    }
}

```

# tsconfig

`sky init tsconfig`

# .gitignore

`sky init gitignore`

# package.json

`sky init package`

# packages and lint configs

`sky init packages`
